resources.string: NutritionTracking is an app to (1) set goals for your nutritional progress, (2) store meals, and (3) view whether or not you are meeting those goals.
(1) In order to SET A GOAL, navigate to the MY GOALS tab, indicated by the 🎯 symbol.
Once here, you may set your goals by dragging the sliders to set the values for daily caloric intake, and the % of each ma️cros that should come from you daily intake.
(2) To ADD A MEAL, navigate to the MY MEALS tab, indicated by the 🥗 symbol.

You can click the ⬅️ and ➡️ arrows to change the date, click on an image to view the meal or edit it, or click the Add Meal Button to add a new meal. It will prompt you to add a picture in one of three ways. Once the photo has been added it’s time to build your meal.

This page allows us to customize and add ingredients to the meal. Click the ADD INGREDIENT button in order to search for an ingredient to the meal. Then enter the text of the ingredient you are looking for, click on a food option, and click ADD TO MEAL to add it. When you are satisfied with your meal, you may click save.
(3) Finally, you may view whether or not you are meeting your goals by navigating to the PROGRESS tab, by clicking the 📊 icon.
Here you can navigate through graphs displaying the daily or weekly summary for nutrient intake.
